TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeConvertingEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Data.TrivialEstimator`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.TypeConvertingTransformer>
Public NotInheritable Class TypeConvertingEstimator Inherits TrivialEstimator(Of TypeConvertingTransformer)

Docs.summary: Estimator for . Converts the underlying input column type to a new type. The input and output column types need to be compatible.

remarks.format:
### Estimator Characteristics | | | | -- | -- | | Does this estimator need to look at the data to train its parameters? | No | | Input column data type | Vector or primitive numeric, boolean, [text](xref:Microsoft.ML.Data.TextDataViewType), [System.DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) and [key](xref:Microsoft.ML.Data.KeyDataViewType) type. | | Output column data type | Vector or primitive numeric, boolean, [text](xref:Microsoft.ML.Data.TextDataViewType), [System.DateTime](xref:System.DateTime) and [key](xref:Microsoft.ML.Data.KeyDataViewType) type. |
Check the See Also section for links to usage examples.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape GetOutputSchema(class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape inputSchema) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetOutputSchema (inputSchema As SchemaShape) As SchemaShape

Docs.summary: Returns the of the schema which will be produced by the transformer. Used for schema propagation and verification in a pipeline.
